bibl.title: Metaphor, Allegory, and the Classical Tradition. Ancient Thought and Modern Revisions
bibl.note: Non vidimus. Cf. Gnomon 75 (2003), Bibl. Beilage 4, p. 141.
OBBINK Dirk, Allegory and Exegesis in the Derveni Papyrus: The Origin of Greek Scholarship.
